name: UIDataSourceModelAssociation
desc: A set of methods that defines an interface for providing persistent references to data objects in your app.

items.name: func modelIdentifierForElement(at: IndexPath, in: UIView) -> String?
items.desc: Returns the string that uniquely identifies the data at the specified location in the view.

items.name: func indexPathForElement(withModelIdentifier: String, in: UIView) -> IndexPath?
items.desc: Returns the current index of the data object with the specified identifier.
